thread.title: NASA finds signs of water on Mars
thread.title_full: NASA finds signs of water on Mars | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: NASA finds signs of water on Mars
text:
Other Articles Sleep may strengthen long-term memories of immune system New test can detect all viral infections in people 'Healthier' sunscreen that does not penetrate skin developed Water, water everywhere! After multiple experiments and tests NASA has announced that liquid water has been found on Mars that may harbor hopes of some life forms on the planet.
The scientists of NASA said that in their quest for extra-terrestrial liquid water on Mars they discovered curious lines of hydrated salt minerals, which require water for their creation, on the Martian surface, News24.com reported.
Lujendra Ojha of the Georgia Institute of Technology in Atlanta and co-author of the research said that their finding would further substantiate that theoretical possibility of liquid brines on Mars.
These results strongly support the hypothesis of liquid water on Mars.
The research paper is published in the journal Nature Geoscience.
 29, 2015 8:26 am
